column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The pastries here used to be stellar
column2: especially the kouign amman and all the croissants.  They were buttery and flaky
column3: probably were among the best in Houston.  Parking was always difficult and line was always to the door
column4: but then it was worth the logistics.  And my sweet friend used to bring some to-go for me so I didn't have to make the effort for their wonderful pastries.
